name: 10 Second Dragon Feeder
description:
10 Second Dragon Feeder is a physics puzzle game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 27 in 2013. The theme was "10 seconds." You have 10 seconds to get the food to the dragon, but can spend as much time on each second as you please. Place objects on the screen to guide the food, but you can only place one per second.

This was my very first Ludum Dare and my first solo-comp entry.

Post-mortem
